description: The Adobe Photoshop CC 2015 update came with a some great feature. For the UI/UX designer Photoshop introduces a new feature which is Artboard. Even though Artboard is in Adobe illustrator for some time, but its new to the Adobe Photoshop. This Artboard is more flexible and time saving for the designer. It also brought a new dehaze feature in the camera raw plugin. Where you can haze or dehaze your image. You can also apply a multiple layer style to a single layer. You can export your image to many different files and much more. By getting this course your photoshop experience will be tremendously skillful than ever. If you already know Adobe Photoshop, but you don't know what is the new feature in photoshop CC 2015 update, then you must take this course to up to date your experience with Photoshop. More than a half hour of this course included all the new feature of adobe photoshop.
title: Photoshop CC 2015: New feature of the  latest update
